page.title: 16The churches of Norham
page.content: Within the Norham and Ladykirk area there are three churches currently in use, a United Reformed church; a church of England and the church of Scotland in Ladykirk. Christenings, Weddings and funerals occassionally take place at each although the narrow doorways of the United Reformed church prevents the actual coffin entering the church. Apart from the Parish church in Norham- the church of England- the congregations must now share ministers with other parishes. Members of other religions, including Roman Catholics, must travel by private cars to Berwick - 7 miles- in order to attend their services.
